participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys spending time with friends and engaging in community service.
participant_1.background: I just want to have fun with my friends. I'm 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Caring and community-oriented, enjoys cooking and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: I volunteer at a soup kitchen. I like watching war documentaries. I'm a retired gym teacher. I was poor growing up. Cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

content.text: Hi! Howdy! ðŸ˜Ž
Hi, pretty nice, and you?
good . just got back from fishing with my 5 kids .
Thats alot of kids you have! I am return from volunteering on a soup kitchen
i love to cook , so i'll be doing a lot of that .
Good for you, you know how to make a cheeseburger?
haha . have i seen a show about this ? i love watching shows on netflix
I like watching war documentaries actually
nice . i like nature a lot . i enjoy exploring the forest .
Nice to hear, i also like wandering in forest
ok . do you have any pets ? i've a collie dog .
I cant afford it, no
two jobs ! goodness ! my husband supports us as a firefighter . we both love helping others
I am volunter and i too love helping others!
well if i was retired , i'd be relaxing as much as possible . ðŸ¤¥
